charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute a quantity of cocaine and cocaine base, a Schedule II controlled substance and 18:2 - Aid and Abet(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons for a total term of two hundred twenty six (226) months as to Count 1,3,4,5 and 6 and sixty (60) months as to Count 2, such terms to run concurrently with the sentence impos ed in 9:96-464. The defendant shall pay a special assessment fee of $300.00, $50.00 as to each Count in accordance with the Bureau of Prisons' Financial Responsibility Program. Upon release from custody, the defendant shall be placed o n supervised release for a term of five (5) years. This term consists of two (2) years as to Count 2 and five (5) years as to Counts 1,3,4,5 and 6, such terms to run concurrently with one another and with the sentence imposed in 9:96-464. The defenda nt shall also comply with the following special conditions: 1) shall pay any remaining special assessment fee within ninety (90) days of release from custody. 2) shall participate in inpatient/outpatient substance abuse treatment which shall include urinalysis testing as deem necessary by the US Probation Officer. The court adopts the factual findings and guideline application in the presentence report except - See Attachment. The sentence is within the guideline range, that range exceeds 24 mon ths, and the sentence is imposed for the following reasons: the Court's consideration of the defendant's conduct while on bond. Defendant disregarded the law and continued to use drugs. the defendant also refused to go to treatment which ma de his acceptance of responsibility reduction questionable, and the amount of drugs in the case. The defendant is remanded to custody. AMENDED: Date Offense ConcludedMay 23, 1993 through June 11, 1993 as to Counts 1,3,4,5,6 and May 27, 1993 as to Cou nt 2.
